recommended_degree: Teknik Lingkungan, Kesehatan Masyarakat, Kesehatan dan Keselamatan Kerja, Kesehatan Lingkungan, Keselamatan Dan Kesehatan Kerja (Sarjana, Diploma)
job_description:
1. Support the implementation of K3 programs and procedures in the project area under supervisor direction.
2. Monitor the work environment to identify potential hazards and report them for follow-up actions.
3. Assist in communicating and socializing HSE Plan, and HIRA documents to project teams.
4. Provide safety support during rooftop solar PV installation activities, including ensuring compliance with working-at-height procedures, proper use of PPE, and safe access systems.
5. Conduct inspections of work-at-height equipment (e.g., lifelines, harnesses, ladders, scaffolding) and report any unsafe conditions immediately.
6. Observe and remind workers on rooftop installation activities to follow safety protocols, especially related to working at height and electrical risks.
